import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faBell, faCog, faEnvelopeOpen, faSearch, faSignOutAlt, faUserShield } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faUserCircle } from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; import { Row, Col, Nav, Form, Image, Navbar, Dropdown, Container, ListGroup, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import NOTIFICATIONS_DATA from "../data/notifications"; import Profile3 from "../assets/img/team/profile-picture-5.jpg"; export default (props) => { const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState(NOTIFICATIONS_DATA); const areNotificationsRead = notifications.reduce((acc, notif) => acc && notif.read, true); const markNotificationsAsRead = () => { setTimeout(() => { setNotifications(notifications.map(n => ({ ...n, read: true }))); }, 300); }; const Notification = (props) => { const { link, sender, image, time, message, read = false } = props; const readClassName = read ? "" : "text-danger"; return (

{sender}

{time}

{message}

 ); }; return (
{areNotificationsRead ? null : } Notifications {notifications.map(n => )} View all
Bonnie Greeeeen
My Profile Settings Messages Support Logout
); };
